message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $85, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if that works for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85.  If you're willing to meet me there, we can finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
